title: Trump says U.S. forces will leave Syria 'very soon'
text:
Trump says U.S. forces will leave Syria 'very soon' 1:39am EDT - 01:13 
U.S. President Donald Trump said the U.S. would be withdrawing forces from Syria 'very soon' at an event in Ohio. No reporter narration. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
U.S. President Donald Trump said the U.S. would be withdrawing forces from Syria 'very soon' at an event in Ohio. No reporter narration. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2pUyqXM
